articles.title: Distressing death warning for 'unregulated' euthanasia drugs - 1News
articles.description: Documents show that sourcing medicines was identified as a 'key risk' to the assisted dying regime.
articles.content:
Patients requesting euthanasia will be given unapproved, unregulated and "off label" medicines, sparking warnings of prolonged and distressing deaths.
Doctor holding patient's hand in hospital.

articles.description: Goa: India’s FC Goa will be aiming to push the boundaries once again when they face Group E leaders Persepolis FC of Islamic Republic of Iran in the 2021 AFC Champions League at Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium on Tuesday.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Muhyiddin: Microsoft to invest US$1bil in Malaysia to set up datacentres - The Star Online
articles.description: Microsoft Corporation will invest US$1bil (RM4.12bil) over the next five years in Malaysia as part of a new partnership programme with government agencies and local companies, the South-East Asian nation’s prime minister said on April 19.
